subject: Football
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Dec. 10 — No part of a football team is designed to work in such synchronicity as the offensive line, a unit equally dependent on the brutishness of a wrestler and the teamwork of the Rockettes.
snippet: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Dec. 10 — No part of a football team is designed to work in such synchronicity as the offensive line, a unit equally dependent on the brutishness of a wrestler and the teamwork of the Rockettes.
